file_summary: This is a Maven Project Object Model (POM) file for the 'spring-petclinic' application, a widely recognized Spring Boot example. It defines the core project coordinates (groupId, artifactId, version) and inherits settings from the 'spring-boot-starter-parent'. The file configures essential project properties, including the required Java version (17), character encoding, and specific versioning for various dependencies like Webjars and build tools. It declares a comprehensive set of Spring Boot starter dependencies for building a web application with data persistence (JPA), validation, templating (Thymeleaf), caching, and monitoring (Actuator). Additionally, it includes runtime dependencies for multiple database systems (H2, MySQL, PostgreSQL) and caching libraries (Caffeine). The POM also configures numerous Maven plugins for critical development tasks, such as enforcing Java version, code formatting (Spring Java Format), code style checking (Checkstyle), native image compilation (GraalVM), generating build information, and code coverage analysis (JaCoCo). It defines profiles for CSS compilation using Sass and for specific Eclipse M2E integration, ensuring consistent development and build environments.
